instruction: Describe the 1981 NBA MVP award ceremony
output: The 1981 NBA MVP award ceremony took place in June of that year. The award was presented to Julius Erving at the banquet, held at the Spectrum in Philadelphia. Erving made a speech, thanking his coaches and teammates for helping him reach his goal. The audience cheered and applauded for Julius, bringing a joyful atmosphere to the event. This memorable ceremony was certainly a great honor for Erving.
